root.name: Harvest Moon: Boy & Girl
root.description: Overview The game starts with a screen, where you get to pick whether you want to be a boy, or a girl. After choosing, it takes you to the title screen, after going through various naming menus, the game starts. You find out that you have inherited your grandpas farm, and it is up to you to take care of it. The village is going to give you three years to fix the farm, which is in poor condition, however, if after 3 years the farm is ruined, or the villagers don't like you, you will be asked to leave. This begins the game, in which you have to fix a farm, plant crops, raise livestock, mine for minerals, and various other activities.
